About Stephen Cunha


For over a century, Baystate Financial has united the industry’s foremost professionals in comprehensive wealth management and employee sponsored retirement plans. As one of New England’s oldest and most trusted financial services firms, we focus our expertise on truly listening to our clients, identifying their objectives, and building sophisticated strategies to achieve their goals.

Stephen Cunha provides individual investors and business owners with custom wealth management and benefit strategies. Whatever you hope to achieve, we seek to advance your goals through all chapters of your life: today, tomorrow, and for years to come.
